SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Burning Hands
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: As you hold your hands with thumbs touching and fingers spread, a thin sheet of flames shoots forth from your outstretched fingertips.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Charm Person
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You attempt to charm a humanoid you can see within range.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Color Spray
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: A dazzling array of flashing, colored light springs from your hand.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Comprehend Languages
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you understand the literal meaning of any spoken language that you hear.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Detect Magic
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: For the duration, you sense the presence of magic within 30 feet of you.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Disguise Self
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Expeditious Retreat
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: This spell allows you to move at an incredible pace.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: False Life
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You bolster yourself with a necromantic facsimile of life.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Feather Fall
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: Choose up to five falling creatures within range.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Fog Cloud
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You create a 20-foot-radius sphere of fog centered on a point within range.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Jump
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You touch a creature. The creature's jump distance is tripled until the spell ends.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Mage Armor
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You touch a willing creature who isn't wearing armor, and a protective magical force surrounds it until the spell ends.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Magic Missile
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You create three glowing darts of magical force.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Shield
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: An invisible barrier of magical force appears and protects you.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Silent Image
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: You create the image of an object, a creature, or some other visible phenomenon that is no larger than a 15-foot cube.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Sleep
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: This spell sends creatures into a magical slumber.

SorcererLevel1Spells.Name: Thunderwave
SorcererLevel1Spells.Description: A wave of thunderous force sweeps out from you.
